manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Minecraft Volume 1 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft Volume 2 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft Volume 3 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft Boxed Set Minecraft Tyler’s life is changed when his family has to move. Thankfully, he has a strong group of friends forever linked in the world of Minecraft. They decide to go on the Ultimate Quest—to travel to the End and face off against the ender dragon! The end of summer has brought new challenges for Evan when a bully chooses to target him. When he and the gang find themselves in a similar situation in the EverRealm, all the players realize they must learn to rely on each other to face adversity. The gang stumbles upon a mysterious ruined portal. Arriving to a strange and wonderful corner of the Nether, they have to face their most intense challenge yet. It'll take the full force of the entire group to overcome the unknown! Collecting all three volumes of the first graphic novel set in the world of Minecraft, plus an exclusive Minecraft poster by Sarah Graley! The first graphic novel in the world of gaming phenomenon Minecraft! The sequel graphic novel to the hit book Minecraft Volume 1, from the hit videogame Minecraft! The third graphic novel installment in the Minecraft series of books, based on the hit videogame Minecraft! Collects Minecraft Volumes 1-3, plus an exclusive Minecraft poster by Sarah Graley!

Minecraft: Wither Without You Volume 1 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft: Wither Without You Volume 2 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft: Wither Without You Volume 3 (Graphic Novel) Minecraft: Wither Without You Boxed Set Minecraft: Wither Without You Cahira and Orion are twin monster hunters. After an intense battle with an enchanted wither, their mentor is eaten and the twins are now alone. The two hunters go on a mission to get their mentor back, and meet an unlikely ally along the way! Twin monster hunters Cahira and Orion turn their sights on solving the mystery of their new friend's hostile mob lure curse. The team must seek out Senan's former nemesis to find a cure for Atria's monster woes. But things aren't what they seem. With new allies at their side and an arsenal of magic at their disposal, Senan, Cahira, Orion, Atria, and Wilkie prepare themselves for the final explosive confrontation with the fearsome creature. But are they a match for the mysterious Wither? An original adventure set in the exciting world of Minecraft, collecting Minecraft: Wither Without You Volumes 1–3, plus an exclusive Minecraft poster by Kristen Gudsnuk! Jump into the Overworld with the first adventure of a three-volume series! Part two of three of the exciting new Minecraft story, Wither Without You! The exciting finale of the epic new Minecraft adventure, Wither Without You! Collects Minecraft: Wither Without You Volumes 1–3, plus an exclusive Minecraft poster by Kristen Gudsnuk!

Minecraft: Stories from the Overworld (Graphic Novel) Minecraft: Open World--Into the Nether (Graphic Novel) Stand Alone Graphic Novels With tales of witch and pillager rivals finding common ground, a heartless griefer who bit off more than they could chew, and valiant heroes new (or not!) to the Overworld, this anthology tells tales that span the world of Minecraft. Join Sarah and Hector on a brand-new adventure that takes them from the Overworld to the Nether, encountering numerous fan-favorite dangers and treasures all the way! From blocks to panels! Minecraft returns to comics in this stand-alone anthology collection of officially licensed, original comic stories! Explore the Overworld in this new tale from the hit videogame, Minecraft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect book for kids about teamwork, sharing feelings, and being supportive friends!
reviews.reviewText: This book is darling, and my 6yo son loved it. He laughed so hard at the facial expressions of the characters and was totally into the story. Afterwards he wanted to retell it to me and have us pretend to play out the same adventure. Great for encouraging early readers. The artwork is charming and there is even a nice section at the end where the artist discusses how the characters were designed and how they create the pages step-by-step.Its ASTOUNDING to me how little it takes for homophobic people to come screaming out of the woodwork claiming that a book is "inappropriate." Two female characters in this story have a very sweet and respectful exchange confessing that they have a crush on each other and want to go on a date. WE SHOULD ALL BE SO LUCKY. The tone and content of their conversation sets an EXCELLENT example for kids, many of whom are absolutely starting to wonder about dating at the age they would be reading this. For kids that are not there yet, it is not a major plot point and they will just pass by it and keep going with the rest of the story. Honestly, I want a WRITTEN STATEMENT from all these "inappropriate sexual content" reviewers that they have never allowed their children to watch a SINGLE Disney film where Mr. Hero and The Princess kiss. A. written. statement.The open and direct exchange between the girls is one of the many wonderful examples in the book of the characters showing genuine respect for each other and for each other's feelings, while being willing to ask for what they need or say what they themselves feel (i.e. showing genuine self-esteem). Adults should read this book as a primer, tbh.An absolute gem in the endless search for good content for kids.Way to go Mojang! Can't wait to get the next one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to inspire young readers
reviews.reviewText: Teaching kids to enjoy reading has always been important to me. This hits a sweet spot for my grandson in matching his interests and having lots of good graphics to back up the reading. Superb for inspiring a kid to want to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: bought this as a gift and my nephew loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for Minecraft fans!
reviews.reviewText: I read this together with my student. He thinks that the Ender Dragon was cute! The story was exciting and interesting! We had a lot of fun reading it together!
Muito bom! Arte bem bacana e história interessante! Legal pra quem gosta do jogo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Good story, gets imagination going, adds to the game.
reviews.reviewText: Grandson loved this (Christmas 2021), though he doesn’t like reading. Still looks at it now and again (Dec 2022). We’ve had various conversations about the story through the year, while playing Minecraft.(GS is autistic, was in Yr7 when he got the graphic novel and loves both Minecraft and Among Us.)

reviews.reviewTitle: It was shipped in a timely matter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Gifted to a youngster on his tenth birthday - met with huge enthusiasm and was finished by bedtime, ready to read again. The graphic novel is justifiably popular, and while the recipient of this copy can read well, it opens up books for those who can't.
